item.title: Report E-2024100638
item.description:
Report E-2024100638

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-29T09:23:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-27
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ADVANTAGE MANAGEMENT GROUP, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 7510
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver had finished delivering diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank. The driver disconnected the delivery hose prior to it being completely empty. Approximately two gallons of diesel fuel was released. Customer personnel handled the remediation.

item.title: Report E-2024100637
item.description:
Report E-2024100637

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-29T09:23:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-27
  • City: ENGLEWOOD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG LEASING, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5040
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver was delivering diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank when a gasket on the pump failed. This allowed approximately 10 gallons of diesel fuel to be released. Environmental Works responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
